Gadget.Name: NaviCell
Gadget.Provider: Computational Systems Biology of Cancer - Institut Curie - http://sysbio.curie.fr
Gadget.Description: NaviCell is a web-based environment for exploiting large maps of molecular interactions, allowing their easy exploration, curation and maintenance. It is characterized by a combination of four essential features: (1) efficient map browsing based on Google Maps, (2) semantic zooming for viewing different levels of details or of abstraction of the map, (3) integrated web-based blog for collecting community feedback and (4) integration into maps and analysis of any molecular data.
